title: Ep. 339 - How Odd Of God
description:
A neo-Nazi attacks a synagogue on Passover, politicians politicize the tragedy, and Avengers is awful. We will examine how this tragedy happened, and why our culture no longer knows how to talk about tragedy. Date: 04-29-2019
